p22: MEMBERS OF THE INSTITUTION
nmc-article: nmc-article
bud-data exprev: This appropriation is intended to cover the office expenses of Members called upon to perform duties and assume responsibilities within the Committee of the Regions or who have acted as rapporteurs. The second part of this appropriation is aimed at providing sickness and accident insurance premiums and specific assistance to disabled Members.
